Class Purchase

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfuel.Entity.Purchase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Purchase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all Product Purchase details.
    Author:
    Maor

        Create new Purchase object with the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        pid - - Purchase ID.
        sid - - Station ID.
        fuelid - - Fuel ID.
        promid - - Promotion ID.
        pdate - - Purchase Date.
        bill - - Total Bill value.
        qty - -Quantity (Liter).

      • Purchase

        public Purchase(int customerid,
                int pid,
                int cid,
                java.lang.String sname,
                java.lang.String fname,
                java.util.Date pdate,
                float qty,
                float bill,
                boolean paid)
        Create new Purchase object with the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        customerid - - customer ID
        pid - - Purchase ID.
        cid - - Car ID.
        sname - - Station Name
        fname - - First Name of the driver.
        pdate - - Purchase Date.
        qty - - Quantity.
        bill - - Purchase total bill.
        paid - - Is the order has been paid or not.
